title: Chinese, Uzbek archaeologists discover early city walls at Kuva Ancient City
description: Chinese and Uzbek archaeologists have discovered early city walls dating from the Parthian to Samanid periods at the Kuva ancient city site in Uzbekistan, with evidence indicating the walls were in use from the third century BC to the 10th century AD.

title: Ancient meditation practices find new life in modern religious communities across America
description: (AP) On most Monday nights, the sanctuary of All Saints Episcopal Church — with its vaulted ceilings, stone arches and stained-glass windows — seamlessly transforms into a space of quiet contemplation.

title: Ancient human hunters used poisoned arrows
description: Ancient humans used poisoned arrowheads to hunt prey 60,000 years ago, archeologists discovered.Traces of plant toxins were found on quartz Stone Age arrowheads in South Africa, the oldest known example, suggesting paleolithic hunters had more sophisticated techniques than previously thought. The...

title: People Stunned by AI's Ancient City Vision: Is Atlantis Hiding Behind the Ice Wall?
description: An AI-generated Instagram video claiming to show ancient city Atlantis hidden beyond Antarctica's 'ice wall' has gone viral, stunning viewers but dismissed by experts as conspiracy fiction blending flat Earth myths

title: Earthworks uncover fascinating ancient burial in East Attica
description: Archaeologists have uncovered an unusually elaborate Early Bronze Age burial in Rafina, shedding fesh light on funerary practices in Attica more than 4,000 years ago.
